column5: ntseaseanam anan a wofi mbepɔw ebien ntamu reba; na mbepɔw no yɛ boran mbepɔw."

column3: mpɔnkɔ memen wɔ mu; na tseaseanam a otsia ebien no
mpɔnkɔ fitaa wɔ mu; na dza otsia anan no

column2: "Nna mibisaa ɔbɔfo a ɔnye me kasae no dɛ
"Na ɔbɔfo no buae see me dɛ
column3: Iyinom nye sor mframa anan a wofir edzi fi asaase nyina EWURADZE n’enyim no."

column2: "Tseaseanam a mpɔnkɔ tuntum wɔ mu no puei kɔr kwaamu afamu asaase do
column3: na efufuw no fiir edzi dzii hɔn ekyir; na wonawona no puei kɔr pomu afamu asaase do."
hɔnho peer hɔn dɛ wokekyin dzi akɔnaaba wɔ asaase do: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom mfi ha nkɔ nkekyin ndzi akɔnaaba wɔ asaase do. Nna wokekyinii dzii akɔnaaba wɔ asaase do."

column5: hɔn a wɔkɔ kwaamu afamu asaase do no wɔama mo sunsum ho asan no wɔ kwaamu afamu asaase do."
"0-11 Gye sika na dwetɛ fi Heldai
column6: Tobija na Jedaia a wofi Babilɔn ndɔmmum aba no hɔ
column7: na da no ara kɔ Zefania ba Josia a ɔno so fi Babilɔn bae no ne fie; na fa yɛ abɔtsir na fa bɔ ɔsɔfopanyin Josua

column4: Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE kasa se nye yi
column7: banyin bi a ne dzin dze Abaw no; na ɔbɛfefɛw wɔ n’ananmu

column2: "ɔnoara na obesi EWURADZE n’asɔrdan no; na ɔbɔsoa enyimnyam no
column3: na ɔatsena n’ahengua do edzi hen; na ɔbɛyɛ ɔsɔfo wɔ n’ahengua do: na asomdwee ahyɛmu no bɛtsena hɔn beenu ntamu."

column2: "Na abɔtsir no bɛyɛ nkaadze ama Helem
"Na hɔn a wɔwɔ ekyirekyir no bɛba ebesi EWURADZE asɔrdan no bi
column3: na hom ehu dɛ dɔm EWURADZE na ɔasoma me hom hɔ. Na sɛ hom dze mbɔdzembɔ tsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne ndze a
